title: First post of the whole project
text: I have created this website where I will document the progress of the project, and I will strive to record every small and big milestone. This website running on vercel.com, and gets data from a selected github repository and displays it on the website.

title: Rethink how this website works
text: Removed the whole backend, and now I am using a simple json file to store these posts. I will probably use a database in the future, but for now this is good enough. Next step will be to create a python program wich will generate and update the json file.

title: Stared to make a demo game
text: Following a tutorial on youtube, I have started to make a simple game. This game will be used to test and try things out. Right now i'm only for the first part of the tutorial, but I will continue to work on it.

title: Setting up requirements
text: I have started setting up the requirements for the project by creating a GitHub repository and writing down the project requirements. Additionally, I have generated the storyline for the game.

title: I continued working on the demo game today.
text: I experimented with camera controls and collision detection. I searched for a free-to-use tileset that will provide the game's graphics and used it to create a level. I spent 3 hours on it, only to realize at the end that I need to scale the tileset images. So I made some progress, but also learned a lot. To be continued.
